Object

类 ExternalLoad

  • java.lang.Object
    • Object.Object
      • Object.ExternalLoad

  • public class ExternalLoad
extends Object
    ExternalLoad object, which is carried and can be launched by other object it has the similar physical properties as the aircraft it can be rocket, bomb, missle and so on missles have guide function, which can lead them fly to target automatically guide methods include Infrared, Radar(Semi-active or active(not yet implemented)) and Command
    作者:
    WangShuzheng

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private Object CapturedObject 
      private double Cd 
      private double Cl 
      private int CountA 
      private int CountB 
      private Vector Drag 
      private int Duration 
      private Explosion explosion 
      private Vector Gravity 
      private int GuideCondition 
      private boolean isEffective 
      private boolean isLauched
      Attributes of externalLoad CountA and CountB are the duration of two level thrust(Some have two, others have only one) LockInterval is the time interval between two guide operation Duration is the duration time for the missle's working GuideCondition defines the direction the missle should go, 1 is for counterClockWise, -1 for clockWise, 0 is level flight CapturedObject is the target this missle will attack on X and Y location defines the location on the owner object for this external Load
      private Vector Lift 
      private int LockInterval 
      private float Mach 
      private Aircraft Owner 
      private ExternalLoadPerformance Performance 
      private Vector Thrust 
      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView View 
      private double Xlocation 
      private double Ylocation 

      • 从类继承的字段 Object.Object

        Acceleration, AOA, Armor, ExternalLoadList, kineticEnergy, Life, mass, MyPlayer, name, RCS, Signature, totalForce, Velocity, x, y

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ExternalLoad(java.lang.String name)
      Constructor of this externalLoad load the performance from xml file Initialize the attribute

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void CreateExplosion(Object object)
      Create explosion by its tnt mass and explosion range, the fuze will work when target is inside its explosion range + hit radius
      void ForceAdd()
      add forces of this aircraft
      Object getCapturedObject() 
      double getCl()
      get the lift coefficient the KCl is the slop of the lift curve
      Vector getDrag()
      calculate the total drag
      double getDynamicPressure()
      Calculate the dynamic pressure of this aircraft
      Explosion getExplosion() 
      Vector getGravity()
      Get gravity
      Vector getLift()
      Get Lift, the direction of the lift is defined by the GuideCondition, and if GuideCcondition is 0, keep level flight
      float getMach()
      Calculate the mach number
      Aircraft getOwner() 
      ExternalLoadPerformance getPerformance() 
      Vector getThrust()
      get the thrust of the externalLoad It has one or two Stage of Rocket Engine, there will be no thrust after these two stage burn out
      javafx.scene.image.ImageView getView() 
      private void Guide()
      Guidemove method of missle type externalLoad Infrared missle guide by Infrared target, Radar missle guide by Radar target it has a guide field and won't guide when target is out of field except it has helmet guide If the missle is semi radar guide, it will empty its tagert after guide, so it need continues lock by owner's radar Guide by Command order for missles with Command guide function
      boolean isEffective() 
      boolean isLauched() 
      void Load(Aircraft Owner, double XLocation, double YLocation)
      set this externalLoad on its owner
      void move()
      move method of externalLoad before launch it move as its owner after Lauch move by themselves

      void setEffective(boolean isEffective) 
      void setLauched(boolean isLauched)

      void setView(double CameraX, double CameraY)
      set this externalLoad on its owner

      • isLauched

        private boolean isLauched
        Attributes of externalLoad CountA and CountB are the duration of two level thrust(Some have two, others have only one) LockInterval is the time interval between two guide operation Duration is the duration time for the missle's working GuideCondition defines the direction the missle should go, 1 is for counterClockWise, -1 for clockWise, 0 is level flight CapturedObject is the target this missle will attack on X and Y location defines the location on the owner object for this external Load

      • ExternalLoad

        public ExternalLoad(java.lang.String name)
        Constructor of this externalLoad load the performance from xml file Initialize the attribute
        参数:
        name - type of externalLoad, used to set the performance

        public Vector getThrust()
        get the thrust of the externalLoad It has one or two Stage of Rocket Engine, there will be no thrust after these two stage burn out
        返回:
        Thrust

        public void Load(Aircraft Owner,
                 double XLocation,
                 double YLocation)
        set this externalLoad on its owner
        参数:

        XLocation - the location where the externaLoad Mounted
        YLocation - the location where the externaLoad Mounted

      • Guide

        private void Guide()
        Guidemove method of missle type externalLoad Infrared missle guide by Infrared target, Radar missle guide by Radar target it has a guide field and won't guide when target is out of field except it has helmet guide If the missle is semi radar guide, it will empty its tagert after guide, so it need continues lock by owner's radar Guide by Command order for missles with Command guide function

      • CreateExplosion

        public void CreateExplosion(Object object)
        Create explosion by its tnt mass and explosion range, the fuze will work when target is inside its explosion range + hit radius
        参数:
        object - object which will active the fuze
